name: Artificial Incompetence
description:
Disclaimer:

This game is very unfinished, It's still playable but there's only one level with no polish. I'm not proud of my time management and the scope of my game. But hey, at least I made something. I still hope you enjoy my game despite its flaws.

In this box puzzle adventure, you play as a robot malfunctioning due to a missing piece of code. The goal is to trap yourself,  making it impossible to complete the level. I was inspired by the way's people were able to trap themselves in the game Portal and so I created a whole game based around that concept.

Controls:

  • W/A/D - Movement
  • Mouse - Grabbing and moving boxes
  • Esc - Close Game
